item.title: 2006-13 MidNorthBroadcaster .doc
item.description:
Edition not numbered [729 by inference] 9 February 2006, page 2

Mid North Broadcaster

The Taylor Group have recently purchased the Burra Broadcaster and Burra Print from Terry and Jill Wilson. The new paper will continue to cover Burra, Eudunda and Peterborough and the surrounding districts. The Taylor Group also owns The Murray Pioneer, Waikerieâ€™s River News, The Loxton News, the Mallee-based Border Times and the Gawler Bunyip. The new paper aims to offer more in colour, a more comprehensive sports section, a TV Guide and horoscopes.
